rule: General themes must be listed in a comma-separated format following the label "General themes:".

validityText:

It discusses specific topics such as "technological advancements" and "societal impacts," which aligns with the part of the specification allowing inclusion of specific topics and general themes. There are no restrictions on the length, and the sentence is comprehensive for understanding, thus allowing for accurate entity extraction. The input text meets all aspects of the input specification directly and explicitly without any violations.

OK
